item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 closed just above the flatline as a trade deal between the U.S. and European Union failed to incite a rally. Here's what's on CNBC's radar...

item.title: MicroStrategy copycats are getting out of control as Canadian vape company joins fray
item.description: The crypto market's bullishness may be tipping into speculative frenzy, if the latest MicroStrategy-style copycat is any indication.

item.title: The industrial sector is the top performer in 2025. These dividend payers still have room to run
item.description: The industrial sector has outshone tech in year-to-date performance. A few names still have upside potential and they offer dividends.

item.title: These stocks are expected to have the biggest moves this week on earnings: Carvana, Roblox and more
item.description: Looking ahead to upcoming earnings, CNBC Pro screened for stocks that could outperform this week in response to their latest quarterly results.

item.title: A bank stock climbing out of a two-decade-long hole has further to run, according to the charts
item.description: Katie Stockton and team breaks down the charts on European banks and Deutsche Bank.
